Code: EXEC SQL SELECT NUM_APOLICE, RAMOFR, MODALIFR, CODCORR, CODSUBES, DTINIVIG, DTTERVIG, PCPARCOR, PCCOMCOR, TIPCOM, INDCRT, COD_EMPRESA FROM seguros.v1apolcorret WHERE num_apolice = :NUM_APOLICE AND codsubes = :CODSUBES AND (dttervig = :DTTERVIG OR dttervig = '9999-12-31') ORDER BY codcorr, ramofr END SQL
